response.title: Power BI API Documentation Overview
response.description: Official Microsoft documentation covering REST APIs, SDKs, and integration best practices for Power BI developers.

response.title: Building Apps with Power BI APIs
response.description: Video tutorial series demonstrating how to use Power BI APIs for data embedding, report automation, and custom solutions.

response.title: API Authentication Best Practices
response.description: Blog post explaining OAuth 2.0 implementation, app registration, and secure API access patterns for Power BI services.

response.title: Sample API Integration Project
response.description: GitHub repository containing code examples for interacting with Power BI APIs using Python, C#, and Postman.
